review: It's great, all they need is Vudu!
author: Adam Contreras

review: This is a fantastic product!! It was so easy to set up. I installed it in my daughter's bedroom so she wouldn't have to take over the television in our family room to watch Netflix and Amazon Prime Instant Video. We've had it a little over a month and we have had no problems whatsoever with the connection or speed. I'm going to buy another one for our master bedroom.
author: S. Lockridge

review: The fire TV Stick is great.  it is easy to set up and very User friendly.  we couldn't be happier with it.
author: LuAnn Randleman
